SetupType.short-description: Installs all products needed for MySQL development purposes.
SetupType.long-description:
Installs the MySQL Server and the tools required for MySQL application development. This is useful if you intend to develop applications for an existing server.
This Setup Type includes:
* MySQL Server
* MySQL Workbench The GUI application to develop for and manage the server.
* MySQL Visual Studio Plugin To work with the MySQL Server from VS.
* MySQL Connectors Connector/Net, Java, C/C++, OBDC and others.
* Examples and tutorials To help you get started with your development.
* Documentation Allows you to read the documentation offline.
SetupType.name: Developer Default

SetupType.short-description: Installs only the MySQL Server product.
SetupType.long-description: Installs only the MySQL Server. This type should be used where you want to deploy a MySQL Server, but will not be developing MySQL applications.
SetupType.name: Server only

SetupType.short-description: Installs only the MySQL Client products, without a server.
SetupType.long-description:
Installs the tools required for MySQL application development, but does not include the MySQL Server itself. This is useful if you intend to develop applications for an existing server.
This Setup Type includes:
* MySQL Workbench The GUI application to develop for and manage the server.
* MySQL Visual Studio Plugin To work with the MySQL Server from VS.
* MySQL Connectors Connector/Net, Java, C/C++, OBDC and others.
* Examples and tutorials To help you get started with your development.
* Documentation Allows you to read the documentation offline.
SetupType.name: Client only

SetupType.short-description: Installs all included MySQL products and features.
SetupType.long-description: Installs all of the products available in this catalog including MySQL Server, MySQL Workbench, MySQL Connectors, documentation, samples and examples and much more.
SetupType.name: Full

SetupType.short-description: Manually select the products that should be installed on the system.
SetupType.long-description: Allows you to select exactly which products you would like to install. This also allows to pick other server versions and architectures (depending on your OS).
SetupType.name: Custom
